clean_data: Database Administrator span lDatabasespan span lAdministratorspan Software Engineer Wayne NJ Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Database Administrator William Paterson University Wayne NJ January 2016 to May 2018 Managed a MySQL database on an Ubuntu LAMP server holding information being used for student classwork and deadlineoriented faculty research projects Worked closely with faculty and their student assistants to help facilitate their research by being available around the clock to provide access and troubleshoot problems Facilitated MySQL access for students for inclass use by creating and distributing tutorials on MySQL PuTTY and WinSCP and responding to students problems via email Created and deleted MySQL user accounts set permissions for professors and student research assistants System Administrator William Paterson University Wayne NJ January 2016 to May 2018 System Administrator for all Computer Science and Computer Information Technology students and staff on Solaris 10 and on Ubuntu LAMP server Worked with faculty and led a team to improve the current setup of the server and the computer labs Proactively reported server problems to faculty to receive guidance for the best solutions Facilitated server access to faculty and students by being available around the clock to troubleshoot issues such as runaway processes setting file permissions expanding data quotas resetting passwords and creating and deleting user accounts Led a team to work on a side project to create 30 external hard drives containing Fedora Linux and penetration testing and networking tools for the 300level course Networking Fundamentals and Security Tested server capability and created documentation on how to compile interpret link and execute source code for Fortran C C Java Python and Perl Created over 70 pages of documentation that detailed the inner workings of the server and UNIX in general so that future administrators would be able to implement the work that I had accomplished in the future Education Bachelor of Science in Computer Technology William Paterson University Wayne NJ May 2018 Skills DATABASE 2 years MYSQL 2 years C 2 years PYTHON 2 years LAMP 2 years Java Javascript HTML 5 CSS Additional Information TECHNICAL SKILLS Fluent in Java with applications including socket servers database access and threading Fluent in C and objectoriented design concepts Experienced in OOP with Python frontend JavaScript and backend PHP SQL HTML5 and CSS MySQL Microsoft Office Troubleshooting Microsoft Windows XP 7 10 Linux Ubuntu LAMP Fedora Kali Unix Solaris 10 Database Administration System Administration
